doc.title: Burlesque Lions and Their Tamer, Hagenbeck's Circus
doc.plot: A most amusing film is this. A number of darkies are seen on all fours in a cage and they snarl and bite at each other like wild animals. The lion tamer cautiously enters and appears to have considerable trouble in subduing them. He pricks them with a pointed instrument and is assisted in this by two men on the outside who have similar weapons. The (lions) darkies are finally subdued.
